TEXT.TITLE: DE LAURENTIIS COMPANIES SEE LOSS ON FILM
TEXT.BODY: De Laurentiis Film Partners LP <DFP> and De Laurentiis Entertainment Group Inc <DEG> said they will take charges of five mln and 6,500,000 dlrs repsectively on their film "Million Dollar Mystery" due to disappointing box office results. Reuter
